text: Inene abo benza isifungo sesibophelelo kuwe (Muhammad) bona enyanisweni benza isifungo sesibophelelo kuAll창h. ISandla sika-All창h siphezu kwezandla zabo. Ke lowo waphula isithembiso sakhe, usaphula ngokuchasene nesiqu sakhe. Lowo uzalisekisa oko athembise ngako kuAll창h, (uAll창h) Uya kumnika umvuzo omkhulu
